ygData.subject: Re: No word from Verant yet
ygData.msgSnippet: my vote goes for mystic alliance
ygData.messageBody:
my vote goes for mystic alliance

David Lari wrote:
>
> From: David Lari <kerik@...>
>
> I have still not received any notification from Verant on the status of

> keep you posted.
>
> As to the name, maybe we should vote on the following two:
>
> Mystic Alliance
> Force of Synergy
>
> At this point, I'd prefer to limit it to those two.
